title: S2 Ep35: The unequal effects of pollution
itunes:title: The unequal effects of pollution
description: Every year, ambient air pollution kills 3 million people, and causes respiratory problems for hundreds of millions more. Can low-paid workers avoid the harmful effects of air pollution without losing income? Bridget Hoffmann and Juan Pablo Rud talk to Tim Phillips about what data from Mexico City reveals.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
dc:creator: VoxDev.org
